extendedInfo.description: The howling wind is delivering a chilling message of evil which is drawing closer by the second. The cold whispers of the forgotten souls tell you to run as far as you can, as fast as you can before itâs too late.

reviews.title: Decent
reviews.comment: Is it fun? Yes, but its the kind of fun that\'s only good the first few times you play it. Also works much better on tablets.
reviews.author: Andrew Korkmas

reviews.title: Fun!
reviews.comment: Great mood, setting game play. Well worth the dollar... But please optimize the menu for tablet and hd phones please! Otherwise, fun.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: The absolute best!
reviews.comment: This is my favorite game! Worth more than I had originally paid for. Please make a sequel to this game in HD with Tegra 2 optimization. I love this game so darn much. I want to really want to see this game fully maxed out. Other than that, best game in the market by far.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun buuuut lol
reviews.comment: I have to be the guy that says but don\'t I seriously tho developer make a free running mode I paid so please make a mode were I don\'t die it would be awsome
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dead runner
reviews.comment: Love the game, very addictive and runs well on my HTC desire s .
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 Stars game
reviews.comment: This game is awesome I love-it! Worth every penny 10 stars from me. You will be a foul not to proffit from this 50% discount!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Well done and no bugs, so I\'m  not going to ask for my dollar back or anything, but there are tons of free games that destroy this.  No addictive factor, very simple, gets  old in a matter of minutes.  Keep the buck for properly  constructing a game, but jeez this could be a ton better with the platform u have set up.    Maybe some jumps and differing scenery?  Ya,  its the monotonous scenery  I think that kills me.   I\'lldefinitely  buyfrom this developer again if they  make a more comprehemsive game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple, addictive, moody.
reviews.comment: Love it! thanks! Did i mention that i love it? More scary stuff would be fun. How about skulls falling out of the trees?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does Work Right Now!
reviews.comment: After the update, this game is working just fine on my tablet now.  (The problem was: \"When I hold it straight [landscape], the horizon is tilted at maybe 30 degrees.  If I hold the tablet so the left side is straight on the bottom, the horizon is straight.\")  This is one of my favorite games on my Palm Pre phone and it is even better on my tablet\'s large screen!  It feels like I\'m in on the action with the big screen.  This game is so addictive!  Points Mode is my favorite.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Simple and addictive. Perfect game for killing a few minutes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: Great game since they fixed the tilt issue for tablets
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fun game
reviews.comment: It\'s too bad they don\'t offer a demo of this game, because if they did, more people would try it. More people would buy it because it is an excellent game for just $1.00 .   Game physics kind of reminds me of the surface level in the old Star Wars vector arcade game.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its get boring make different landscape and i will buy it

reviews.comment: A great little time waster

reviews.comment: Fun and atmospheric. Good for killing a few free minutes.

reviews.comment: Nice runner, but the sound is of low quality and the graphics look very dated!
